0.name: The edge of the forest
desc: You are standing at the eastern edge of a big forest.  To the east is the
barrier of the midnight thicket and to the west is a narrow trail, leading
in through the forest.

extra.desc: The forest trail winds westwards through the trees.

desc: The trees are quite tall considering most of them appear to be quite young.
On one of the trees, crude letters forming the word "Haon-Dor" have been
carved into the bark.

1.name: A trail through the light forest
desc: You are on a trail leading through the forest.  To the east is the forest edge
and to the west, the trail leads further into the forest.

extra.desc: The forest trail winds east-west through the trees.
Very cute little creatures, they seem to enjoy life.

2.name: A trail through the light forest
desc: You are on a narrow trail leading east and west through the forest.  To the
west, the forest gradually becomes more dense.  A small forest path leads
south.

extra.desc: The narrow path is probably used by the animals living in the forest.

desc: The young, slender trees look beautiful, their fresh, green leaves moving
lightly in the wind.

exits.desc: The trail continues eastwards through the young trees.
The small path leads south through the young trees.
You see the narrow forest trail winding westwards into the dense forest.

3.name: A trail through the dense forest
desc: You are on a trail leading east and west through the dense forest.  To the
east, the forest gradually seems to become lighter.

extra.desc: The forest trail seems almost fragile compared to the massive trunks.

desc: The dense crowns of the mature trees leave only a fraction of the sky to be
seen through the leaves.

exits.desc: The trail continues eastwards to the younger part of the forest.
You see the narrow trail winding westwards through the dense forest.

4.name: A trail through the dense forest
desc: You are on a trail leading east and west through the dense forest.  To the
west, the trees are so huge and their crowns so dense that forest remains in
total darkness.  A small path leads south through the trees.

extra.desc: The narrow path is probably used by the animals living in the forest.
The crowns of the old trees almost cut out all light.

exits.desc: The trail continues eastwards through the dense forest.
The small path leads south through the trees.
The narrow trail almost seems to disappear between the enourmous trunks.

5.name: A small path in the dense forest
desc: You are on a small path leading through the dense forest.  The crowns of the
old trees leave the forest in an unreal twilight illumination.  The path
continues north and south.

extra.desc: The narrow path is probably used by the animals living in the forest.
The trees are mostly old beeches and oaks.

exits.desc: The small path leads north through the trees.
The small path leads south through the trees.

6.name: A small path in the dense forest
desc: You are on a small path leading through the dense forest.  The crowns of the
old trees leave the forest in an unreal twilight illumination.  The path
continues north and east.

extra.desc: The narrow path is probably used by the animals living in the forest.
The trees are mostly old beeches and oaks.

exits.desc: The small path leads north through the trees.
The small path leads east through the trees.

7.name: An intersection in the dense forest
desc: You are on a small path leading through the dense forest.  The crowns of the
old trees leave the forest in an unreal twilight illumination.  The forest
gradually lightens to the east.  Paths lead east, west and south.

extra.desc: The narrow path is probably used by the animals living in the forest.
The trees are mostly old beeches and oaks.

exits.desc: You can barely make out a clearing to the east.
The small path leads south through the trees.
The small path leads west through the trees.

8.name: The forest clearing
desc: You are in a clearing in the forest.  Lots of fresh stumps of varying sizes
protrude from the ground and heavy logs are stacked neatly in a big pile
supported by stakes set into the ground.  Paths lead north, east and west.
Even though the logs have been chopped to shorter pieces, they are quite heavy
as they are fresh and still filled with sap.

extra.desc: The trees are mostly old beeches and oaks.

exits.desc: The small path leads north through the trees.
The small path leads east through the trees.
The small path leads west through the trees.

9.name: Outside a small cabin in the forest
desc: You are outside a small cabin built entirely from heavy logs.  There is a
wooden door to the north and small paths lead west and south through the trees.
It looks simple but comfortable and the slender trees make the whole place seem
pretty idyllic.  It's a cabin built from logs.  Wooden logs, not system logs.

extra.desc: The trees are fairly young, not much more than a hundred years or so.

exits.desc: The wooden door is quite sturdy but does not appear to be equipped with a lock.
The small path leads south through the dense forest.
The small path leads west through the light forest.

10.name: Inside the cabin
desc: You are inside a small one-room cabin made entirely from heavy logs.  It is
very sparsely furnished, containing only most basic housekeeping equipment,
such as a bed, a chair and a table.

extra.desc: It is definitely not the most comfortable bed you have seen in your life.
A heavy table that doesn't even appear to rock.

11.name: A small path through the light forest
desc: You are on a small path leading through the forest.  The trees are tall and
slender.  Paths lead north and south.

extra.desc: The narrow path is probably used by the animals living in the forest.
The trees are fairly young, not much more than a hundred years or so.

exits.desc: The path leads north through the young trees.
The path leads south through the young trees.

12.name: An intersection in the dense forest
desc: You are on a small path leading through the dense forest.  The crowns of the
old trees leave the forest floor in an unreal twilight illumination.  Paths
lead north, east and south.

extra.desc: The narrow path is probably used by the animals living in the forest.
The trees are mostly old beeches and oaks.

exits.desc: The small path leads north through the trees.
The small path leads east through the trees.
The small path leads south through the trees.

13.name: A small path in the dense forest
desc: You are on a small path leading through the dense forest.  The crowns of the
old trees leave the forest in an unreal twilight illumination.  The path
continues east and west.

extra.desc: The narrow path is probably used by the animals living in the forest.
The trees are mostly old beeches and oaks.

exits.desc: The small path leads east through the trees.
The small path leads west through the trees.

14.name: An intersection in the dense forest
desc: You are on a small path leading through the dense forest.  The forest gradually
lightens to the north.  Paths lead north, east and west.

extra.desc: The narrow path is probably used by the animals living in the forest.

desc: The crowns of the old trees leave the forest in an unreal twilight
illumination.

exits.desc: The path leads north to a lighter part of the forest.
The small path leads east through the trees.
The small path leads west through the trees.

15.name: A small path in the dense forest
desc: You are on a small path leading through the dense forest.  The crowns of the
old trees leave the forest in an unreal twilight illumination.  The path
continues south and west.

extra.desc: The narrow path is probably used by the animals living in the forest.
The trees are mostly old beeches and oaks.

exits.desc: The small path leads south through the trees.
The small path leads west through the trees.

16.name: A small path in the dense forest
desc: You are on a small path leading through the dense forest.  The crowns of the
old trees leave the forest in an unreal twilight illumination.  The path
continues north and south.

extra.desc: The narrow path is probably used by the animals living in the forest.
The trees are mostly old beeches and oaks.

exits.desc: The small path leads north through the trees.
The small path leads south through the trees.

17.name: A small path in the dense forest
desc: You are on a small path leading through the dense forest.  The forest seems to
become lighter to the west.  The path continues north and west.
The crowns of the old trees leave the forest in an unreal twilight
illumination.

extra.desc: The narrow path is probably used by the animals living in the forest.

18.name: An intersection in the light forest
desc: You are on a small path leading through the forest.  A path leads north to a
small field and other paths lead east and west into the dense forest.

extra.desc: The narrow path is probably used by the animals living in the forest.
The tall trees are young and slender, not much more than a hundred years or so.

exits.desc: The path leads north to a small, grassy field.
The path leads east to a dense part of the forest.
The path leads west to a dense part of the forest.

19.name: A small path in the dense forest
desc: You are on a small path leading through the dense forest.  The forest seems to
become lighter to the east.  The path continues north and east.

extra.desc: The narrow path is probably used by the animals living in the forest.

desc: The crowns of the old trees leave the forest in an unreal twilight
illumination.

exits.desc: The small path leads north through the trees.
The small path leads east through the trees to a lighter part of the forest.

20.name: A small path in the dense forest
desc: You are on a small path leading through the dense forest.  The crowns of the
old trees leave the forest in an unreal twilight illumination.  The path
continues south and west.

extra.desc: The narrow path is probably used by the animals living in the forest.
The trees are mostly old beeches and oaks.

exits.desc: The small path leads south through the trees.
The small path leads west through the trees.

21.name: A small path in the dense forest
desc: You are on a small path leading through the dense forest.  To the west there is
a cave entrance.  The path continues north and east.

extra.desc: The narrow path is probably used by the animals living in the forest.

desc: The irregular opening is eight feet wide and six feet tall.  An acrid smell
emanates from within.

exits.desc: The small path leads north through the trees.
The small path leads east through the trees.
The cave is very dark.

22.name: Inside the cave
desc: You are in a natural cave.  Various sorts of debris cover the stone floor,
emitting a rather unpleasant smell that makes the air thick and hard to
breathe.  The only obvious exit is east.

extra.desc: It consists mostly of gnawed bones mixed with small pieces of torn fur.
Kind of transparent, but quite noticeable nevertheless.

23.name: On a small, grassy field
desc: You are in a small, grassy field somewhere in the forest.  The tall grass
nearly reaches your waist, and the surrounding oaks and beeches form an almost
wall-like thicket on all sides of the field.  A small path leads south through
the trees.

extra.desc: The tall grass makes a nice hiding place for animals.
The trees form a close thicket.
